task.title: Implement Swarm Mini TUI for interactive worker messaging

events.content: Used crossterm with event-stream for async keystroke reading, and futures-lite for StreamExt on EventStream: Used crossterm with event-stream for async keystroke reading, and futures-lite for StreamExt on EventStream

raw.question: Used crossterm with event-stream for async keystroke reading, and futures-lite for StreamExt on EventStream
raw.chosen: Used crossterm with event-stream for async keystroke reading, and futures-lite for StreamExt on EventStream
raw.reasoning: crossterm is lightweight and well-supported for terminal manipulation; futures-lite provides the necessary StreamExt trait for tokio::select! compatibility with crossterm EventStream
